Take a helicopter tour For something unforgettable, book a helicopter flight over the Matterhorn and the surrounding 4000-metre peaks. It’s expensive but provides some of the most stunning alpine views you’ll ever see. 12. Visit Findeln This small hamlet above Zermatt is accessible on foot or via Sunnegga and is known for its panoramic views and traditional alpine restaurants. It’s a perfect lunch stop during a hike, especially in summer when the terraces are open.
